original_text: Wilt thou set thine eyes upon that which is not? for riches certainly make themselves wings; they fly away as an eagle toward heaven.
korean_text: 네가 어찌 허무한 것에 주목하겠느냐 정녕히 재물은 스스로 날개를 내어 하늘을 나는 독수리처럼 날아가리라

sentences.original_text: Wilt thou set thine eyes upon that which is not?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 실재하지 않는 것에 네 눈을 두겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: for riches certainly make themselves wings;
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 재물이 스스로 날개를 만들기 때문이니라;

sentences.original_text: they fly away as an eagle toward heaven.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 독수리가 하늘을 향해 날아가듯 사라지느니라.
